Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This is really a very good printer. It is a little slow on startup, but print rate is just fine for my needs. I use it to print (mostly documents), copy and as a document scanner. (I scan photos on a different flatbed scanner designed more specifically for photos and slides.) The scanner setup required help from Canon's tech support, but once the correct drivers were installed it scanned documents quite well. I've seen comments on ink consumption but I find it to be about the same as other printers I have owned. For the money, this is an excellent printer. Given its cost, I really have nothing negative to say.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Fast Print Time
Easy set-up, and doing a fantastic job for all of our business needs. This printer has great scanner image quality and prints quickly with vibrant colors. It is compact with a sleek design, and was the perfect choice to speed things up here at our office.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Compact Design
I have been very happy with the Cannon Pixma printers and this is no exception. It was easy to set up and does not take up too much room on the desk. I printed some photos right away and the colors were perfect and the clarity was amazing. The quality of printing for a unit in this price range is outstanding. My only slight complaint is that the first use of the day, it cycles for a long time before the first print. After that is it fine.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality printer for low price
Cons: Nothing yet
I came off a bad experience with an HP Printer. Found out 3 of my co-workers had a Canon and decided to give it a shot. The set up is super easy including the Wireless setup. The quality of document and especially photo print is stunning. These photos look better than some I've had processed at the store. The quality of document prints and copies is incredible. The time between turning it on and it being ready to print could be a bit shorter...but for the quality print it gives I guess I'll be patient.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable construction; Easy To Set Up; Clean Design; Reliable; Easy To Use; Compact Design
We've only had this for a few weeks and are very happy with it. Given that it's a flatbed scanner, the size is reasonable and it looks very clean. Print quality for photos is very good, as well as for documents. Only giving it 4 stars because it hasn't stood the test of time for us yet. Our last Canon served us very well and so we're hoping for the same with this one.
Item.HelpfulCount: 2 out of 2 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: good photo quality + AirPrint capability at a low
Item.Review: I was able to do setup and install completely wirelessly with with no problems. I thought for the price i paid ($114) I would get an out of date model without the AirPrint firmware, but it came with 2.0 and worked with my iPad immediately. Great for printing pdf s and web sites, haven t figured out how to print full page photos yet from iPad, however--they come out as 4x6 on a full 8.5x11 page. Jury still out on performance and reliability but i m optimistic--ink is reasonably priced.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: good wireless printer for basic home use
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Easy to follow directions
Cons: Slow Print Time
Got this printer after alot of investigation. Compared prices, quality (per reviews), size and looks.I chose this one as it seemed it would be the best in my price range for picture quality. I was able to set it up easily ( and I am not tech savvy). I have printed 2 pictures for review before i made an official decision on whether I was keeping it. I have to say - very good quality print for pics. I am a regular SNAPFISH and Shutterfly user - and for those occ ones I want to print at home - I am VERY satisfied. The initial print is very slow - but then the rest seem adequate. I print only one or two pages of black and white at a time but have had no problems. I have no comments on the copy or s ... can features to date. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Price and Great Quality
Cons: Slow warm up
The print quality on this printer is exceptional, the colors come through very vibrant and bold. Small details are shown very nicely in each picture I've printed thus far. The wireless function works great and has easy setup. The only critisism I could possibly give this printer is the initial start-up speed when you first turn it on and have to wait for it to warm up. The actual print time however is quite speedy.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Compact Design; Quiet; Easy To Use
Cons: Hard Setup
Quirky setup to my wireless network, but easy to use after initial setup. Really nice, compact design. Truly amazing print quality for the price --nothing I've seen comes even close! Love the 2-sided printing.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quiet; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Large Footprint
I have only owned/used HP printers in the past. Variety being the spice of life, I decided to give Canon an audition. Relatively easy setup for wireless. Calibration also not pain inducing. I haven't tried printing on photo paper. I will be impressed if it is able to print dirently onto CDs/DVDs with the included tray adapter, as advertised. Dollar for dollar, this Canon printer surpasses my previous HPs in value and quality.
Item.HelpfulCount: 2 out of 2 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Compact Design
Cons: Slow Print Time
It's fine for the small things I use it for. I have not had to purchase the ink cartridges yet so I have no idea what they will cost. The sales associate was helpful until I didn't purchase the extended warranty and left me at the counter without asking me if I needed help to my car to carry out the printer. Pretty rude of him since I'm a senior citizen. You put too much pressure on these sales people to sell those extended warranties and not enough kindness to help out customers.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Durable construction; Reliable; Low Ink Consumption; Easy To Use; Compact Design
good printer, was simple to set up. Only will buy Cannon or another brand no HP, they break to easily. It is a model down from my office 4 in 1. We use this for our business in the house so I don't have to keep walking to office to print something. Great price, great all around and the best uses the same ink as my 4 in 1.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Ability to not be in standby mode.
Cons: No document feed.
Price was very good. Printing is effortless and I leave it on two-sided as default to save paper. My last printer had a hard time coming out of stand-by mode when you wanted to actually print something but this one has the ability to turn that feature off. With four different devices printing to this at all hours of day and night that really helps. Easy to set up on the wireless network and has worked flawlessly for 2 months. I have not had to change ink yet but it appears to be using the same as any other I've had. Compatible Ink cartridges available on the internet for a lot less than the Canon's.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Reliable; Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Durable construction; Compact Design; Low Ink Consumption; Price was great
Great Product! Best of the three printers I have owned. Bought one for my 90 year old mother also.She wanted something easy to operate and dependable, and she loves it! She is recommending it to all her friends who hesitated getting printers because they thought they were too difficult to operate .

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Can't match Epson for true color prints
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use
Cons: Poor color print tones
Had several (4 or 5) Epsons. They all printed great pictures (sharp, true colors). But they broke down after only a year or two and Epson had no repair facilities. All I could do was buy a new one. I swore off Epson and switched to Canon, but I'm not impressed. I haven't consulted Canon tech support yet, but I don't think they can help.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of setup, print speed
Cons: Ink cost
Excellent all-in-one printer, very good value. Did not make wireless connection, but found that task somewhat confusing on a similar Canon printer.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Compact Design; Easy To Use
I like this printer for: 1) Compact and sleek design. It fits on my small shelf and looks like a beauty. 2) Separate ink tanks. 3) Auto duplex helps save paper.
The setup using USB cable or normal wireless is simple and straight forward. I even use "Connectify" or "mhotspot 4Lite" to connect the printer and laptop wirelessly without a router whenever I use wired internet connection.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up and quiet printing
Cons: use up the ink too fast
This wireless printer is very easy to set up and like the dual printing feature. Very impressed with the photo print quality and DVD printing.
The only disappointment to find out I need to replace 3 ink cartridges in less than 2 months since I bought this printer not counting I hardly use the color printing! That may explain why this printer cost less than HP as ink will cost you lots of $$.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time; Durable construction; Compact Design
Cons: Slow photo copying
Very nice printer for the price. Brought this printer on sale for [$] at Staples

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Set Up, Good Price, Prints DVD's
Cons: Software Is Quirky
I bought this to replace an HP D5460. It is a good wireless photo printer for a great price. I print quite a few DVD's for clients and this does a good job. The installation is easy and I use it exclusively as a wireless printer. The software is a bulky and clunky, but overall is ok. I use Surething Deluxe to print and there are some hoops that you have to jump through to print on a DVD. Wireless scanning is pretty easy as well.
Overall, I recommend this printer.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything
Cons: nothing
I love this printer!! It was really easy to setup.. very smart software took care of everything!! Prints gorgeous pictures and perfect documents. I got lucky when i bought it because it was on sale for $99.99. Wireless was a breeze to setup thxx to my Cisco wireless router. I have never had an easier printer setup in my life!! It is not however the fastest printer in the world but the end results are worth the few extra seconds it takes! I love how photo paper has its own loader in the top and regular printer paper goes in the bottom tray.. i think this is a good design overall!! Well done canon!!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: I would buy this product again
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Easy To Use
Pixma MG5320 printer is sleek and good looking. I am not electronic savvy but found this printer very easy to setup. I connected it to a PC and laptop without difficulty. Also very simple to operate. I would highly recommend this Canon printer.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This wireless printer is fairly easy to set up and is very sleek looking. Standard printing is surprisingly slow so I may give it a try with a direct connection. I haven't tried printing photos yet, but the general quality of the output has been very good.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Takes a while to warm up
We bought this printer to replace an HP that died after only about 6 months. So far I am pleased with the quality of printing and the ease of use. The price point was great for the features it has.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Just what I wanted and more!
Item.Review:
Pros: Quiet; Fast Print Time; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Easy Setup; Size; Easy To Set Up
Cons: None so far
Just what I wanted, to replace my old Cannon printer that I was very happy with. Easy to use out of the box, connected without any problem to my computer. Great quality pictures and printed material. The price I paid was much lower than I expected. Delivery in 24 hours at NO cost.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Durable construction; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time
I'm still not sure about the quality of photo prints. The printer was very easy to set up. I purchased a wireless HP printer for my mother over Christmas and the set up for that one was much more complicated.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: As a graphic artist, it was important for me to get a printer that prints true colors and clear details. I found it in the Canon PIXMA MG5320. From easy set-up to crystal-clear photo printing, I couldn't be happier with my decision. I also liked the fact that it didn't come with a fax feature - it wasn't something I wanted and therefore wasn't a feature I was willing to pay for. Yes, I may have been able to find a cheaper printer, but I think that's exactly what I would have gotten, and that's something I can't afford in my business. Impressions are everything and this printer helps me feel confident that I leave a positive impression with my clients. It's proving to be a great business partner!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: my only real issue with this is that the ink goes real quick. I got this to replace my MP500 and the ink cartriges are only 2/3rds the size of those in the MP500, empty very quickly but cost the same. Had to change the settings on all my computers to print in fast mode to conserve as much ink as possible.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Good but S L O W.
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Reliable; Easy To Use
Cons: Slow Operation; Large Footprint; Noisy
A good printer that prints good quality pictures and documents. It is above average on ink use, which means it uses less ink than other printers. It is very slow on printing the first item.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quiet; Reliable; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
Surprised by the excellent quality, especially for the price. Called tech support to get firmware update to use printer with IPAD. Support was great and was from a support center in VA not Asia. Liked that.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Slow to get going if it has been off.
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality
Cons: Slow Operation; Large Footprint; Hard Setup
Very slow to get started if has been off. Difficult to learn but probably good if one has the patience.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Easy To Use; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality
Good printer, good price. Haven't had it long enough to see how long ink lasts, ink can be pricey, this model takes 2 separate black ink tanks, plus color ink

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Quiet; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Jams Easily; Slow Operation
Controls and apps are very good. Takes a while for the first page, but then it speeds up. It kept saying there was no paper when I realized that it was looking for the back feeder rather than the regular paper tray. Jammed a couple times during setup, but not since. It seems to fit my needs.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Quiet; Great Print Quality; Easy wifi setup; Easy To Set Up; Great quality image print
Very impressed with the photo print quality. Wifi setup was very easy and works well. (Note that if you plan to use a usb cable you need to get one that has a special printer jack) Fast (draft) mode is plenty good if you want to save $ printing docs. On the other hand, it takes a bit of time (maybe 15 secs) to process a complex form, and strangely it makes noise before it starts printing. Also the paper drawer only holds the paper on 3 sides so that when it feeds in forms the printing doesn't start at exactly the same spot. I use the vertical back loader in these situations. Overall, very satisfied.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy set up, great price, fantastic pictures printed.
Cons: Nothing yet.
I just purchased this printer. Setup was really easy. I just inserted the disk and followed the instructions and the setup was complete in around 30 minutes. It connected to my WiFi flawlessly.
So far I have printed 5 pictures and they came out just as good, if not better, then if I had printed them at a store. I was also able to connect to the printer with my iPad and iPhone very easily.
I have not yet tried to scan pictures wirelessly, but am confident I will not be disappointed when I do.
All in all, a great printer for under $100!!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Compact Design; Quiet; Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Easy To Use; Reliable
Very happy with this product. I take alot of photos, and I love the picture quality when I print them out. Just as good, if not better than what I've gotton at photo printing stores.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Have had the printer for 1 month
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Compact Design
The first one I brought home was defective, and did not work. I returned it for another and that one worked fine. I've only had it for a month or so, and so far we like it and it works well.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Scanner, Copier and print
I love this printer. I bought this printer because I am a full-time student and I didn't want to have to go to the library everytime I needed to print something and it's great. I'm also able to scan documents and email them to professors if need be and make copies right from home. It's an easier way for me to scan all returned documents and file them so I have proof of my work just in case I or the professor loses any hard copies. I couldn't have purchased myself anything more convenient as a student besides a laptop. It was also very easy to setup with my computer.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
Cons: Too much ink used; Large Footprint
This printer is a mixed bag. Most features easy to set up and easy to use. The printer is fast and copies are of great quality. On the down side, I don't like to have half a dozen icons on my desk top related to the printer and I don't need it every time at start up so the foot print is a little too big for me. The lower paper tray is tough to access and cumbersome to use. The last thing is that it uses a lot of ink. In less than 2 weeks I ran through all the starter ink that came with the machine (why not give me standard ink trays with the unit) and replacing all the ink trays is quite pricey. Like I said, it's a mixed bag!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: For home use this is a very good printer. Having separate ink tanks is a must for me. I had an older Epson that had one black tank and one color tank. You would run out of one of the four colors and the whole tank had to be replaced, even if the remaining three were full of ink. All-in-one color tanks aren't cheap, either. Overall good buy for the price and print quality. I'm happy with this purchase.
Cons: Is somewhat slow to begin printing(older Canon I had before this did the same. Got faster over time), and once it starts, it prints fast. Scans and copies just as well as it prints with great quality.
I read other reviews that complain of this being an ink hog. I have to wonder just how much are they printing? This is not a business printer, by any means, it is a all ... -in-one home photo printer. Business printers are designed with larger ink tanks that cost a lot more than this Cannon(and the ink tanks, too), but are made to go much farther and produce far more documents than this MG5320 was designed to. I bought this printer locally as my kid took my old Canon off to college and I needed a new one right away, and a week later I find the same one at the 'EGG for $49 less. My loss. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Fast Print Time; Easy to read display; Compact Design
Cons: Glossy black finish; Slow to set up
I love my new wireless printer. It is fast and does duplex printing which is nice. Display and buttons are easy to read with or without glasses. Haven't printed any pictures yet but general printing is great.
Directions for set up were clear and worked the first time. It took some time to load the software and calibrate. Don't expect a quick start.
Shiny black case shows dust and marks very easily.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This printer is very easy to setup on a wireless network. So far it has printed over wireless without any issues. The color quality and speed are great. The screen is very easy to use and scanning to a computer works as well.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Easy To Use
Great buy for the [$] price which includes a set of ink cartridges. This is my second Canon All-in-One Printer. The last one lasted 3 1/2 years.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design
Cons: Slow Print Time; Hard To Use; Too much ink used
It just sits there and makes noises - I'm afraid using much ink to warm up. Directions for use are not good. Wish I had an instructions BOOK!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Fast Print Time; Durable construction; Easy To Set Up
Love it. Did not know it was wireless. Got a good deal and then found out it was. It is fun to print from my laptop.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Easy To Use
This is everything I need. Very easy to set up. Very easy to use. Colors are more accurate that my last printer which was not a Canon.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable construction; Easy To Use; Reliable; Fast Print Time
Cons: Hard Setup
I like the printer very much. It fits in my office environment nicely. I have owned the printer for about 3 weeks and have had no problems. My only complaint has to do with the disc they gave me to upload the software. It didn't work requiring me to go on line and get some assistance from Canon to bring the printer on-line. I love the wireless capability and it now works great.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable construction; Easy To Use; Reliable; Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Compact Design
I bought the MG5320 because of its compact design since I have limited space. I am impressed with the quality of the print and photos. With the Staples ink cartridge recycle program I find the cost of ink is not excessive.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Durable construction; Fast Print Time
You will be amazed how this printer can help at home! Is great. Awesome quality print and is wireless and I can print from iphone and ipad. Great!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up
Cons: Slow Print Time
I have just begun to use it. Print speed is OK, but it takes some time to begin printing. I've only used the copy and scan functions once each to test them, and they worked well. I can't tell about ink usage yet.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Low Ink Consumption; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Compact Design
Having to replace a familiar printer was intimidating. But the Canon has immediately become our favorite printer of all time!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: quicker than average print speed with good quality output
Cons: can only print photos from Canon Android app
I have only had this printer a few weeks but I am completely satisfied with this unit. I have not tried printing any photos yet so i can not speak to the speed or quality of that. I can however say it's text output is of very good quality and it is quick. If you leave the printer in standby mode, it starts rather quickly. From a cold start the printer takes longer than I amused to waiting for the printer to be ready to print (I previously had a Canon i850) The scanner is fast and of good quality.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Compact Design; Low Ink Consumption; Easy To Use; Durable construction
I have only had it about a month, but so far this is a great printer. It does double sided pages automaticcally which is nice for saving paper. It wasn't hard to set up and it works with my ipad. I love the wifi and for the price, I am very happy.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: It's got multi ink bays
Cons: No A.D.F. feature
So this is my first canon printer. I was so excited to use it when I got home. When I opened it I realized that this model does not have a document feeder. It only has a flat bed scanner. To me that is way to prehistoric since most of the time I need to scan something it is multiple pages. I was fooled by the second paper tray which I mistook for an ADF. Why does a tiny printer like this need to paper trays??? Otherwise this printer is pretty nice. Good print quality. Not professional grade, but for $149 I'd say it's a good buy.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable construction; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Reliable
I really like this printer. It is easy to use -- have only printed documents, not photos yet. The set-up was very easy once I understood the buttons (I did not have a manual!).

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: It's a bit difficult to use the interface on the actual printer, at least for scanning. Seems to work fine for copying. For scanning I prefer to use my computer to instruct the printer. Also, the CD tray has nowhere to be when not in use, which is a bit irksome. The print speed is very fast, once it starts printing. Takes a bit to warm up or memorize the file or whatever it's doing.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: It's a great printer, scanner, copier.
Item.Review:
Pros: Print quality and ease of wireless use
Cons: Its consumption of ink
I'm very satisfied with the quality of documents and photos from the Canon MG5320. The wireless feature works very well and allows you to print documents or photos from any computer connected to your local network. And with the Canon Easy-PhotoPrint app, you can print photos from your cell phone.
How does Canon afford to sell the MG5320 at such a low price? It's the ink, stupid! For whatever reason, the ink from the first cartridges is gobbled up at a very quick pace. Ink usage seems to ease a little after the first cartridges are consumed, but only by a little. There are several aftermarket compatible ink cartridges that can save a few dollars, and if you are really into pain, you can try one of ... the Continuous Ink Supply Systems (CISS) out there. Be prepared for lots of trouble and mess though with those systems.
If you can get past the rapid consumption and expense of the ink, you will enjoy using the Canon PIXMA MG5320. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: An excellent all-in-one @ a good price
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
Cons: Large Footprint
Received machine w/in days after order thru Staples. A cinch to set up & use, working flawlessly since. Has more features than I normally use, but I like knowing that they are available should I need them. Works great on network and makes excellent pictures.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: great features
Cons: slower startup
Bought this printer for my mom's mother's day present to replace another Canon that died after 5 good years. Picked it because of the air print for iPhone/ipad. Worked flawlessly and was easy to setup. On the downside it has an extremely long startup time. But rolls after the first startup.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: The setup was very thorough and quite easy to follow. Although I have only had it for a few days, initial impressions of the print quality and ease of use are high. Highly recommended.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to install, quality print for both documents and photos
This printer has surpassed my expectations. I first was able to connect it manually to both my computers, but got the courage to try and put it in as part of a home network and, happily, that was an easy transition. I'm very happy with the purchase!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time
Cons: Flimsy Construction
It's fast and I like the double sided print feature. Not to mention the wifi was very easy to set up.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Print Quality and Speed
Cons: Warm Up Time
- Top quality photo printing. - Easy to use menu system. - Excellent quality text and graphics. - Plenty of capacity for blank paper. - Wireless working great.
The original set of ink cartridges ran out very quickly. However, the replacements seem to be lasting much longer. I am thinking the originals were only 'starter' cartridges and maybe filled to only 25% capacity?

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Great product, especially considering the low price! The photos are extremely good and rival those of photo printers using 6 or 8 different color cartridges. Low noise, fast printing modes. The scanner works great as well. Good ink (not OEM) is available at low cost - just print whatever you like and as much as you like

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Pretty Good, especially for the price.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Low Ink Consumption; Reliable; Fast Print Time
Cons: Large Footprint
The black plastic shows the paper dust. White or silver would be better. Also, inexpensive ink is available.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This is a sleek looking printer that has a beautiful, bright print. Since it has a larger black cartridge for text printing, and the individual cartridges are reasonably priced, it's the best of the new inkjet printers available right now. The wireless printing is a big plus. If you have to replace your printer, I recommend this model. It does have almost twice the footprint of my decade-old inkjet. It does not fit on a bookshelf. However, because it is wireless I can find a place for it anywhere in range. This model does not fax. DO read the manual carefully when you are setting up your printer; it is not quite as plug-and-play as printers were once upon a time. Even if you print black-and-white text, it will use some amount of the colors & photo black, which is the case with all p ... rinters that have individual-color cartridges. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Print settings maintained; Compact Design
Cons: Slow Print Time
S-l-o-w printer. Shuts itself off when not used for a while, then takes forever to calibrate itself before printing, then the printing is slow too. Light type is even lighter on a copy when this machine is used to make a copy.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
I was forced to purchase a new printer that was compatable with Windows 7 64-bit. This printer met all my requirements and seems to be a good printer for the price.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Slow Print Time; Large Footprint
My family primarily prints text or photo copies documents, but the scanning function created a good facimile of a handwritten formula. I was able to print from an IPad without more than a couple of minutes of setup for the wifi connection. Haven't tried to print photos yet, but text quality is very satisfactory.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Good set up instructions, great price.
Cons: It's kind of heavy.
I read the reviews before I purchased this printer and saw a few that said this printer was a good value but slow. I didn't find that to be the case at all. The set-up instructions were spot on and easy to understand, the printer has a nice look and great printing capabilities and compared to my previous printer, extremely fast. I would recommend this printer for any home use. I hope that it lasts a long time.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Low Ink Consumption; Fast Print Time
A very easy to use printer, very good photo scanning and printer software and hardward! Wireless setup not reliable, and impossible to setup after doing wire setup. I don't need wireless, but if I did, I would not recommend this machine.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Not as good as I expected
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Durable construction
Cons: Slow Print Time
Had Canon MP530 worked fine for years.Color went bad. This one is not as good.Bought for WIFI and price.Cartridges are smaller and color not as good.Had to set up several times ,kept loosing WIFI.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
I am very pleased with this printer. Two main pluses: both the set-up and the speed of printing are better than I expected. Because we are using this wirelessly, I expected some difficulty, especially after the advisor at Staples warned me that it could be tricky. It wasn't! The step-by-step directions were very clear and I was able to set it up without a hitch. However, do allow about 1.5 hours to get all the way through to registration. I am no computer genius, yet I had no trouble with set-up. In addition, the print speed is very good. Granted, our old printer was eight-years-old, so maybe that allows for the difference. Still, the wireless data is sent quickly from our laptop on a different floor of our house to the print ... er in the basement, and the printing is quick and with excellent quality. Not only would I recommend this to a friend, but I'll be buying one for our daughter! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great printer, great price, great servic
Item.Review: Wonderful second printer. Prints, scans, copies. Could not be easier to use. Very simple wireless set-up. Highly recommended! Moreover, B&H Photo was great; easy to order and promptly shipped. Did I also say, Great Price, too?

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Does what it says it will
Item.Review:
Pros: Convenient; Easy To Use; Reliable
Cons: AirPrint setup glitches
Bought this printer for wireless printing access. Set it up with a MacBook Pro wirelessly, and we were up and running in about 30 minutes.
The AirPrint setup for use with iPads and iPhones was a little harder. Because it was manufactured before the AirPrint feature was offered, it required a software upgrade. That means you have to hard-connect the printer to your laptop, download a software upgrade, and install it. The instructions weren't an easy read, but I found some instructions on Google that got me through the process.
SET UP DONE? This printer works great! Worth the hassle!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Durable construction; Compact Design; Low Ink Consumption
Printing wireless from my laptop or my iPhone, works great. Scan feature works great, too. This replaced another Canon Pixma I had. Very Pleased!!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: works great but a little noisy
Item.Review:
Pros: ease of set up and price was on sale for $99
Cons: noisy
I purchased this to replace an older printer. This printer is used for 3 computers and the wireless network was easy to set up. I also used this to print labels onto DVD's for family videos and they turned out great and were easy to set up. the only con that I see for now is the printer is kind of noisy but I will be able to live with that.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Easy To Use
Had the product for a week. Wasn't difficult to hook up and so far it's done what I expected it to do. Haven't tried to print pictures yet but will at some point.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Best Purchase I've made in a very long t
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Reliable; Low Ink Consumption; Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Easy To Use; Durable construction
Cons: Not one I can think of
Nothing more to say. Easy to set up, Easy to use and very smart design, compact and very reliable.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: You can't go wrong with Canon printers! Easy to setup & use! Even though the wireless connection was easy to setup, i do wish it had an ethernet port since it sits right next to the router.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: After purchasing this printer in order to print custom labels on CD/DVDs this printer has lived up to the adverstisement. The printer is easy to use and setup for printing on discs is a no-brainer. The print quality is sufficient for non-screenprinted labels as well. All other functions of the printer perform as advertised, and the on-board printer GUI is nice and simple. Aside from the time it takes from the printer resetting itself from sheet fed printing to preping for disc label printing, its a small price to pay for the good quality finished product and no mess.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Overall, I'm happy with the MG5320. It replaced a Pixma MP620 that died. I'm a photographer, and I print A LOT of photos. The photo quality using Canon Photo Plus Glossy II paper is very good, though (like the MP620 I had), the photos tend to have a slight yellowish tint for some reason. I manually adjusted the profile (-20 Yellow), and that minimizes the effect for the most part. There's probably a better way to fix it using Color Management, but that simple change works for me. The wifi setup could not have been simpler. It was surprisingly painless and straightforward, akin to setting up a laptop or phone to use a wifi access point. That was a pleasant surprise. My only real gripe is that it seems to take forever to run through the cleaning/warmup routine before you print, but as long ... as you're not trying to print a term paper at the last second before you rush out the door, that's not too big of a deal. Overall, I've been happy with it so far. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Quick and easy to setup. Solid all-in-one that scans well and prints quickly. We owned a previous Canon and had to replace it. This one is an updated version that we are very happy with.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great wireless printer for the money
Item.Review: The printer was easy to set up out of the box, it prints well, the wireless connection was formed pretty quickly, and the printer scans well. I think it's a good design.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I generally use this printer with my iPad 2, but since it's wirelessly connected to my home network, I sometimes print from my Android phone, my PC and my Mac too. I love the AirPrint capabilities and the fact that I could set up my Canon Image Gateway account right on the printer to access and print pictures I have stored online. The setup was pretty easy. After installing the newest firmware update, using a generic printer cable I had lying around, I setup the connection to my home network. Instead of using the default method, I used the standard connection (I believe it was called). It was very easy. I've printed documents and photos, and the print quality was excellent, especially for a printer priced under $300. Nice job Canon!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Best printer I have ever used.
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Low Ink Consumption; Reliable; Easy To Use; Durable construction
Great printer for the price. Love the wireless features.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Durable construction
Cons: Slow Print Time; Incredibly slow
It is tedious to switch paper trays. It takes over 30 seconds to print the first page (too many "checks") & is not very fast after that.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
This is a great all in one printer that I use for daily use and small photos up to 8.5x11. Find something with more blacks to B&W stuff.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Compact Design; Easy To Use
Had Canon multi printers for years. Much simpler to use and more compact. I like shutoff feature and fast startup time.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Low Ink Consumption; Fast Print Time; Durable construction
This product is great. I had no problem setting up within minutes. Terrific!!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Replacing a six year old Canon IP3000 printer which broke. Decided to try the all-in-one printer as the price is reasonable and I like Canon products. I don't print many photos, but the scanning and duplex printing, I could use for home use. Still learning the machine, but after a week, the color ink cartridges went down quickly by 1/3 but maybe this is typical of all-in-one ink jets. I didn't need to go wireless as a set-up so used my USB cable. It was an easy set up. It is a little noisy but you can choose a silent setting if you want. Controls seem to be easy to navigate. It takes a few seconds for print set-up once it is turned on. Plan to give the machine a fair try.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Reviewer: The Man from the Home Office
Item.Review: We wanted a printer for our home office for basic printing, scanning, and copying. This one looks really nice and is fairly easy to use. The wireless was very easy to set up as was the rest of the printer. I really like that it has a hidden tray for the paper feed, and there's a feed in the back for thicker paper. As other reviewers have pointed out, the three buttons in addition to the scroll wheel means I end up getting to the wrong menu selection on occasion--the three buttons really are unnecessary, but I've mostly gotten used to them. A solid printer for the price.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up
Cons: the ink runs out to fast and cost way to much (ink)
the ink runs out to fast and cost way to much (ink). Is cheaper to buy a new printer when ink runs out for almost any printer now.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Nice Printer but Tough to Connect
Item.Review: My attempt to use the setup software to connect to my wi-fi caused the wi-fi to disconnect my other devices. I had to re-install the wi-fi and still have not been able to connect the printer to the wi-fi. Connecting via ethernet works fine. Nice printer.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: AirPrint (print and scan) and double-sided printing
Cons: Medium-low print speed
I got this for my mom mainly for AirPrint so that she can print from her iPad. Worked flawlessly from the first time. There's a free app you use to change the paper size, paper type, etc., which you can't do normally through iOS. So she can print her photos easily now. You can even scan things to your iOS device with this app, which was a plus.
The printer also does real double-sided printing where it sucks the page back in and flips it over for you, which is rare and very useful. I think this only works for PC/Mac printing, not iOS though.
Only minor downside is the print speed is a bit low, but still manageable.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Separate color ink cartridges so less waste of ink.
Cons: Slow to print first page of a document but fast after that.
For one low price we got a printer, copier and scanner. The print quality is very good. We do some photo printing on plain paper but mostly print B&W and Color documents. It was easy to install and we LOVE the fact the color cartridges are separate from each other. We do NOT use the WIFI capability. Also love the printing on two sides of a page.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Great Print Quality; Compact Design
Cons: Slow Operation
Good printer. A bit slow to start. Prints fast enough. Does good job on printable CD's.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice Design
Cons: Prints colors wrong
Canon's MG5320, like lower-end, recent generation Canon inkjets, can't seem to print red on plain paper. It's a shame as the 5320 otherwise seems pretty well designed. The paper drawer/tray is the actual bottom of the printer, making it more difficult to open, & they went to their older style, extending rear paper feed/support, but those are minor negatives I could live with if it didn't print red as orange. Also darker prints tended to have a blue or purplish tint [that can be compensated for in software], while all images/graphics printed to non-photo paper showed an awful lot of grain. We're more than happy to live with that level of print quality with our 1/2 dozen other Canon printers, but those are bottom dollar remans [~$ ... 25] used for everyday tasks where that sort of thing doesn't matter, & in fact on plain paper the output from 1 of our MX320s actually looked better than what we got from the MG 5320!
One thing I immediately disliked was Canon put LEDs on their print cartridges to tell you the cartridge installed properly [they also can tell you when the ink is low or out, but I can't imagine opening the printer to check ink levels when with a mouse click you can see the same thing]. We pay enough for ink cartridges already without upping the costs by adding LEDs you don't need [perhaps an attempt to distinguish Canon ink from 3rd party replacements?].
The included software is for the most part useless & unchanged from 3-4 year old versions. Their photo print app can't use ICC profiles or Windows color management in win7, makes it a lot of extra work to import an image to print on a CD/DVD, and makes you set the diameter of the CD/DVD printable area in inches rather than mm [& only goes to 2 decimal points, making it impossible to avoid non-printed, outer white rings]. There's very little in the way of printer ICC profiles &/or driver-based color adjustments.
All in all I really wanted to like the MG5320, but in the end I simply couldn't justify keeping it ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: My PIXMAMG5320 replaces a PIXMA 620 and has all the functions of the 620 plus it will print both sides of paper without requiring the operator to reinsert the printed document. I haven't used this feature yet. I use it in a wireless network and found it to be very easy to set up. At [$], this printer is a great buy. My similar PIXMA 620 cost me $249. MY only negative comment and the reason for a 4 star rating is speed. It takes the printer an unusually long time to process print commands (over one minute)but once it completes processing it is probably as fast as the manufacturer states.A great plus with Cannon in my experience is their customer service. They are knowledgeable, helpful, and easy to communicate with.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Quiet; Reliable
Cons: Large Footprint
Bought this to replace a kodak all in one and I must say this is a huge improvement. I like that all the ink tanks are seperate, the other printer I had they were all attached so when one color ran out and it refused to print I had to waste all that ink and buy a new huge cartridge.
Ink lasts longer than my other one as well. Haven't tried to refill a cartridge yet but I'm going to bet it's chipped and not refillable.
Large footprint which I don't like but it works.
Set up it a bit complicated but easy to follow.
Lots of nice features. The best one is the paper tray under the printer, makes the footprint a bit smaller and the paper doesn't get dusty.
Only con I have is whenev ... er you turn the printer on and make your first print it takes it's sweet time getting ready then prints. But after its warmed up that first time it's a quick printer.
Nice color, better than my last printer that had muddy color.
VERY quite which I love!
Printer looks great too, but the plastic is so smooth that it shows every fingerprint. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Easy To Set Up; Quiet; Great Print Quality; Compact Design; Reliable
I had a Cannon before and liked it a lot. Then I bought a Kodak printer, mostly because their ink is so much less expensive. On the Kodak printer the print heads messed up all the time, the time it took to print one color page was FOREVER and the life of the printer was SHORT. I am happy to be back with Cannon.
Item.HelpfulCount: 0 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This unit is connected to a Mac but I don't have wireless so I have to use the USB connection. It's a great printer and scanner combo. I bought this model because it can print on DVDs. However I can't find any software templates or instructions in how to setup artwork to print. I sent Canon an email a week ago to ask them if anything like that is available. They have failed to reply. Can't even find anything online to get me started. Other than that, if performs very well.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Quiet; Easy To Set Up
This machine is easy to install, use and it is reliable. I don't know how much would be the cost of replacing the ink. That I am very concern.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Prce point; Easy Wireless Setup; Easy firmware update; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality
Cons: Large Footprint; Ink usage; Software nightmare; Terrible CDDVD tray
Good print quality. Setup was easy and quick. Wireless connectivity. I can tell already ink usage will be an issue. The included software suite is poorly designed and way too broken up. The CD/DVD disc printing quality is very good but the tray design is terrible (no built in storage and the mini-disc adapter is not attached so will soon be lost).The printer design is attractive but not a big fan of the black color (fingerprint and dust magnet). Price when I purchased was [$], good bargain.First Canon printer so will have to wait to comment on reliability.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great price for a very high end device
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Quiet; Easy To Use
Nice machine that was invented to create long term print cartridge buyers. Use it as a copier or scanner and minimize the need to buy more ink cartridges. Otherwise, you'll be sucked into paying very high cost for this product's print output.
Item.HelpfulCount: 0 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Operation; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Quiet; Reliable; Compact Design; Great Print Quality
This was a better buy than I might hafe expected. It's the best printer we have purchased.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Canon easy to set up printer
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
My husband wanted to use the printer without having to email me a document. The wireless feature was the most desirable feature. I had another Canon I used for crisp photo printing, but always used HP for the all-in-one features of all my other printing. Today, I replaced the HP because I was tired of all the jambs and bad printing I was dealing with and am so pleased with everything about the Canon. I may give away the second printer since this will do it all.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Esy to set up, easy to operate, easy scanning
I use this for home and home/office use. Have had it about 2 months now and has worked flawlessly. Wireless connection was simple to set up and photo printing is good. I like the choice of using paper from the papwer try below the printer or the paper stack at the back. Don't have to constantly change paper types when you have the choice of which tray to use.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use
Cons: Starter Inks Run Out Fast; Long Processing Time
I often get a message "processing ... please wait." I haven't had this problem with other printers. Other than that, a good printer.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up
I haven't had this long but the set up with the wireless was simple. The prinquality is very good and the color has been very good so far.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Too much ink used
If I had to pick a CON it would be the amount of ink used BUT...I don't think it uses any more than other printers. I absolutely LOVE the quality of pictures that are printed and the wi-fi capability.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I was looking for a large format printer for scrapbooking. This is it!!! The colors are awesome and I love the fact that I can print my own digital scrapbook pages!!!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: We have been satisified from the start
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality of picture printing
From the beginning we have been very pleased with the printer. The ease of establishing the wireless connection for all the computers was great. We are especially amazed at the quality of the pictures we have printed.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Not a very durable, good quality printer.
Item.Review:
Pros: The ink is cheap.
Cons: The picture printing quality was not as good as a cheaper hp I bought a year before.
This printer lasted only about 8 months. Printing documents was okay because ink was cheap, but the picture quality was not so good. I was not impressed. I will stay away from Kodak because of this printer.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time
Another in a long line of Canon printers for me. Big fan of Canon and never been let down. Recommended

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast, easy to set up, and print quality as good as I will ever need it.
Cons: Nada
Great speed, quality of scan and print is greater than I will ever need. WIRELESS allows me to hook up everything, including iPad and iPhone.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Reliable; Fast Print Time
Cons: Large Footprint; Too much ink used
I was fortunate enought to be able to talk with a canon rep in store about this printer, and ask the questions I had read in earlier reviews (printer stops working when one color runs out) It does not, it just wont print with that color anymore. Nice, helpful rep; and he gave me a free pack of Canon photo paper to boot. The printer was very easy to set up, it works well. It uses more ink than I would like, but not as bad as my very old lexmark. It takes a long time to startup, the photo and document printing both look very good, scanning works well. Wireless just simply works. Borderlesss 4x6's, duplexing, haven't tried cd printing (hope I get the chance before I lose ... the cd tray). expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Not a good experience at all
Item.Review: The printer refused to maintain communication with the Mac. Problem persists after software reinstalls. I am the person who purchased the printer. My son is the one tried to get it going for me. Finally, he got on the phone with Canon tech support. It was well over and hour. They finally recommended our taking the printer to a repair service here in Englewood, CO. It is a Denver suburb pretty much across Denver from us. The end result is my not having a printer for over 30 days now. We have had Canon Video cameras, still cameras, and Canon printers. We never had problems until we got this PIXMA MG5320. As a 78 year old buying the printer, I would be nervous in the future buying another one in the future. Just FYI, at age 78 I'm still working full time. I'm on a computer a lot. I would ... not have been very good at trouble shooting this situation. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Fast Print Time; Low Ink Consumption; Easy To Use
Really enjoying having a wireless printer! This was fast and easy to set up and have all computers and laptops in the house able to print from it. Controls are lit up, so easy to see and select. Everything on it works surprisingly well, including changing the ink when needed (but it lasts and lasts!) Paper drawer automatically opens, which helps when in a hurry. Like the high quality of the final print outs.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: We bought this printer to have Air Print cabability as well as upgrading our old printer. We have been using it for about two months now and are satisfied with it's performance. It does all of it's jobs just fine. The only area I can not make much of a comment on is the photo printing aspect. I printed out a couple of small photos just to check it out and they were OK. I have a good size Epson for real photo printing and this printer is our every day printer. The scanning function works well and is useful. We really like being able to print both wirelessly and Air Print from IPads. You need to down load and install a firmware update from Canon to make the air print thingie work - it is simple enough to do. On the down side, sometimes it seems to take a bit of a long time to wake up and ... actually start printing. Over all, a good little printer! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: B&H a Great Place to Purchase Equipment
Item.Review: This review is as much about B&H Photo as it is the Canon PIXMA MG5320. Needing a printer, this choice turned out to be a compromise. I really wanted a printer that would print upto a 11x17 size, but decided on this one instead. This is at least the third Canon printer I've purchased, and this one is as nice a printer as the others I have owned. This is also at least the fourh major purchase I've made at B&H Photo. They're a great place to shop on line. It would be nice to be able to visit their actual store someday.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Solid value for a great price
Item.Review: I basically use this printer for home use and I'm not a professional photographer or anything like that, so I guess that may be the caveat here. But for my use, the printer does a very good job at printing digital pictures, documents, and scanning for the price I paid ([$]).I've only had it for a couple weeks so I can't comment on the ink usage. Construction is fairly solid but I did notice the power connector was kinda loose. The printing/scanning was performed pretty quickly...maybe could be faster. I like the led menu display, I found no problems using it.My connection is via wireless n-radio. Through the Setup option on the display you can easily scan and detect your network and configure accordingly...I had no problems with it. I would suggest making the printer's connection static o ... n your router so it keeps the same IP.You get a startup guide, but the manual is on the CD. The CD will also help you configure your connection (wireless/USB) so I suggest using it.Overall, a good value for a great price. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Didn't really need a scanner, but I wanted a printer that can print directly onto blank CDs. THe CD printing software is low end - I'm used to Adobe products, but I thinjk I have it figured out. The scanner is OK - software is a bit clunky, but images are OK. Print time is a little slow, but I don't print that much so I don't mind the wait. I like the fact that you can close up all the input/output doors to cut down on dust getting inside. B&H was the best price I found on this printer. Haven't had it long enough to know all the pros/cons.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality and feed
Cons: So far so good
After all the hassles with HP and Epson paper feed issues this unit is just short of a blessing! I use my printers for high end quality images and my “office” unit for everything from proofs to billing. While this is not a Pro unit it is the best office unit so far. My thanks to Canon!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I replaced an older Canon Pixma. The main reason was to get wireless printing, which works great and was very easy to set up. The added bonus is the speed and quiteness! Of course the print quality is excellent.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Simply put, this printer does the job it is supposed to do. I t was easy to set up, the wi-fi works great and everything else is fairly easy to figure out. The printing is slow at times, but that is as negative as I will get about this product.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Durable construction; Easy To Use
Great printer. It is good looking, work well and reasonably fast, Photos come out excellent. I like the display graphics, and the flip down door.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Easy To Use
Cons: Consistant error messages; Unreliable; Hard Setup
I bought this for my office because I have a Canon copier at home that has been trouble free. The wireless setup on this gave me fits. Ended up hard wiring it. Also, there is an error message "6C10 Error" that comes up at least once a week and necessitates a series of steps to revive the printer. It's annoying and time consuming. It also FLEW through the first color ink cartridges and I mostly print in B&W. Am disappointed in this model.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I bought for air print capabilities, which works well, (once you go through an hour of set up and upgrading) No document feeder or fax capabilities. I thought all-in-one's had fax at least. My bad for not looking at features. I owned a MX870 which was great but no air print. Service at Staples is fair, with sales team not really knowing what was what. They had no idea of what air print was (really!!) overall a decent machine for limited use.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This was the easiest all-in-one printer that I have ever installed. I was also able to master the system procedures within a couple of hours. A truly great printer for the cost.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: find it slow to respond, and scans not as easy to maneuver as the epson scanner....but it may be initial tests. It does eat quite a bit of ink.... Had to call support to set up airprint. They were very helpful

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: We're using this printer with my wife's school computer. It was very easy to set up and the wireless connection allows it to be used from all computers in the house! The included scanner makes copying a breeze.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Easy to use. We set up wireless printing from our iPhones by updating the printer from our computer. Quick double sided printing, fair photo printing. Ink consuption is high, but replacements are affordable if you shop around.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MG5320 Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: The printer is great. Takes a little time to start to print but when that starts its very fast. Setup was easy and it connected to my wireless network without a hassle. Scanner is good. Takes some time to tweak the software like you want it to be but otherwise good.
